header.description: Experience professional China residence permit services with expert Chinese immigration guidance and proven success

expertGuidance.title: Expert China Immigration Guidance
expertGuidance.fullDesc: Get personalized guidance from certified China immigration consultants with 10+ years of experience in Chinese residence permit applications.

documentSupport.title: Complete Document Support
documentSupport.fullDesc: We handle all paperwork, document authentication, notarization services, and ensure 100% compliance with Chinese immigration requirements.

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance Guarantee
legalCompliance.fullDesc: Your application follows all Chinese laws and regulations with our legal team ensuring complete compliance and reducing rejection risks.

dedicatedManager.title: Dedicated Case Manager
dedicatedManager.fullDesc: Each client gets a dedicated case manager who guides you through every step, answers questions, and provides regular updates on your China permit.

fastProcessing.title: Fast Processing Times
fastProcessing.fullDesc: Streamlined process reduces typical waiting times by 40% through efficient document preparation and direct Chinese government liaison.

highSuccessRate.title: High Success Rate
highSuccessRate.fullDesc: 98% approval rate for China residence permit applications with over 5,000 successful cases completed in China over the last 5 years.
